profile.name: Md Rakib
profile.title: Flutter Developer
profile.bio: I am a passionate Flutter developer with 1+ years of experience in building high-quality mobile applications and modern user interfaces. Specialized in creating scalable cross-platform solutions with a focus on seamless user experience.

projects.title: Blue Java
projects.description: A secure lottery platform where users can purchase tickets and win prizes.
projects.details:
Blue Java is a comprehensive lottery management system built with Next.js. 

Key Features:
• Admin Dashboard: Create and manage lottery events, set prize pools, and publish results.
• Ticket Purchase: Secure and seamless ticket purchasing process for users.
• Automated Draws: Fair and transparent winner selection algorithm.
• User accounts: Track purchase history and winnings.

The platform focuses on trust and user experience, providing a modern interface for lottery enthusiasts.

projects.title: Levaro – Service Marketplace Application
projects.description: Service provider & service booking platform where providers can create profiles, publish services, and manage requests.
projects.details:
Levaro is a sophisticated marketplace platform designed to bridge the gap between service providers and consumers. As a lead Flutter developer, I implemented a dual-app architecture within a single codebase. 

Key features include:
• Dynamic Profile Creation: Providers can showcase their expertise, portfolio, and pricing.
• Real-time Service Management: Instant updates for service listings and availability.
• Booking Flow: A streamlined end-to-end booking process with status tracking (Pending, Accepted, Ongoing, Completed).
• Interactive Dashboard: Comprehensive insights for both consumers and providers to manage their interactions efficiently.

The app emphasizes performance through optimized state management and a responsive design that ensures a premium feel across both Android and iOS devices.

projects.title: Neowash – Car Wash Booking Application
projects.description: On-demand car wash booking app allowing users to select car type, model, date, and time.
projects.details:
Neowash revolutionizes the traditional car wash experience by bringing it to the user's fingertips. This application focuses on high-precision scheduling and customization.

Technological Highlights:
• Intelligent Categorization: Users can select specific car types (Sedan, SUV, Hatchback) and models, with the app dynamically calculating service duration and pricing.
• Calendar Integration: A robust time-slot booking system that prevents overbooking and ensures service provider efficiency.
• Location Services: Integrated map functionality for users to locate nearby service zones or set their own location for home services.
• Push Notifications: Stay updated with real-time alerts regarding booking status and upcoming service reminders.

The UI was crafted using custom animations and a sleek 'glassmorphism' aesthetic to provide a modern, high-tech experience for automotive enthusiasts.

projects.title: Money Saving App – Personal Finance Management
projects.description: Expense and savings tracking app with bill payment reminders and budgeting tools.
projects.details:
The Money Saving App is a personal financial companion designed to promote better saving habits and financial literacy. It simplifies complex financial tracking into an intuitive daily routine.

Core Functionality:
• Automated Tracking: Seamlessly record income and expenses with categorized breakdown (Food, Rent, Entertainment, etc.).
• Budget Planning: Set monthly or weekly limits for different categories with visual progress indicators.
• Data Visualization: Implemented advanced charting libraries to show spending patterns over time, helping users identify where they can save.
• Bill Reminders: Never miss a payment with custom notification scheduling for recurring bills.
• Secure Storage: Utilized local encrypted storage for sensitive financial data, ensuring user privacy.

This project showcased my ability to handle complex data structures and state management while maintaining a clean, distraction-free user interface.

projects.title: Vibe – Multi-Service Platform
projects.description: An Uber-style application for ride-sharing, food delivery, and parcel sending services.
projects.details:
Vibe is a comprehensive multi-service ecosystem designed to simplify urban logistics and daily needs. 

Key Capabilities:
• Ride-Sharing: Real-time driver matching with dynamic fare calculation and route optimization.
• Food Delivery: Integrated restaurant marketplace with live order tracking and multiple payment options.
• Parcel Service: On-demand delivery for documents and packages with secure verification.
• Centralized Wallet: Unified payment system for all platform services.

The application utilizes advanced geospatial services and real-time data streaming to ensure a seamless experience for users and service providers alike.

projects.title: Advocatorio – Legal Service Marketplace
projects.description: Professional booking platform for lawyers and law firms featuring live consultations and webinars.
projects.details:
Advocatorio is a high-end legal tech platform connecting clients with legal professionals. 

Sophisticated Features:
• Professional Matching: Advanced search for lawyers and law firms based on specialization and rating.
• Webinar Integration: Integrated Zoom support for online legal events and seminars.
• Resource Center: E-book and course marketplace for legal education.
• Real-time Collaboration: Secure chat with document sharing, image previews, and direct Zoom meeting creation.
• Advanced Notifications: Complex push notification system for meeting reminders and legal updates.

This project focuses on security and confidentiality, providing a trusted environment for professional legal interactions.

projects.title: Dakar Go – Travel & Hospitality Hub
projects.description: All-in-one travel app for hotel bookings, tour planning, and customer support.
projects.details:
Dakar Go streamlines the travel planning process, offering a centralized hub for tourists and travelers.

Core Features:
• Smart Booking: Real-time availability for hotels and curated tour packages.
• History Tracking: Comprehensive overview of all past and upcoming travel itineraries.
• Integrated Support: Direct messaging system to admin for travel assistance and queries.
• Instant Alerts: Notification-driven support responses and booking confirmations.

The app's clean, travel-oriented UI focuses on ease of use and quick access to essential travel information.

projects.title: Goltz Asphalt – Company Management System
projects.description: Internal management solution for workplace tracking, task reporting, and administrative control.
projects.details:
Goltz Asphalt is a specialized workforce management tool designed for the construction and maintenance industry.

Operational Highlights:
• Daily Reporting: Streamlined interface for workers to upload daily task progress and photos.
• Admin Oversight: Real-time monitoring dashboard for management to track field operations.
• User Management: Direct admin capability to create and manage employee accounts within the app.
• Efficiency Tracking: Automated time logs and task completion metrics.

This B2B solution enhances departmental transparency and operational efficiency through digitized reporting.

projects.title: Corporate Employee Management
projects.description: Corporate HR tool for managing employee attendance, leave requests, and performance monitoring.
projects.details:
A dedicated internal tool developed to modernize human resource operations within a corporate environment.

Functionality Focus:
• Attendance Tracking: Geofenced or manual check-in/out system for employees.
• Leave Requests: Automated workflow for submitting and approving leave applications.
• Performance Monitoring: Centralized view for management to oversee employee tasks and work status.
• Secure Profile: Personal employee dashboards for record keeping and communication.

The application significantly reduces administrative overhead by digitizing routine HR processes.

projects.title: TrackPoint360 – Event & Memory Tracker
projects.description: A comprehensive event and memory tracking application that allows users to capture moments with location-based media and manage data via CSV import/export.
projects.details:
TrackPoint360 is designed for users who want to preserve their travel memories and special moments with precision. 

Key Features:
• Location-Based Memories: Save events tied to specific coordinates with support for high-quality images, videos, and audio recordings.
• Data Portability: Full support for CSV format, allowing users to export their entire history for backup or import existing data to keep their memories synchronized.
• Multimedia Integration: Seamlessly attach and play back various media types directly within the event timeline.
• Offline Capability: Robust local storage ensures that memories are captured even without an immediate internet connection.

The application focuses on providing a seamless user experience for travelers and memory-keepers alike.

experience.description:
• Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Firebase, ensuring high performance and scalability.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement user-friendly solutions.
• Contributed to the development of applications including Helper, Tennis, and Neowash, enhancing functionality and user experience.

experience.company: Department of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering, IIUC
experience.description:
• Supported faculty in conducting laboratory sessions, grading assignments, and mentoring students in core technical subjects.
• Facilitated hands-on learning in electronics and telecommunication concepts.

• Gained practical experience in telecommunications systems and network infrastructure.
• Assisted in operational tasks, contributing to a deeper understanding of industry applications.

• Designed and delivered responsive websites and professional logos for international clients.
• Managed multiple projects, ensuring timely delivery and client satisfaction.
